tool.name: GFF Region Selector
tool.description: Tool to polish the raw ProfRep output in order to interconnect fragmented parts of individual repeats, optionally supported by domains information

param.name: gff_input
param.label: Choose input GFF3 file to cut

param.name: seq_to_cut
param.label: Type in the name of the sequence you wish to extract the region from

param.name: new_seq_id
param.label: Type in a new sequence name for the cut region
param.help: In case of using JBrowse it must correspond to the cut reference sequence name
